ow.routing
インタフェース RoutingService

既知の実装クラスの一覧:
AbstractRoutingDriver, IterativeRoutingDriver, RecursiveRoutingDriver
public interface RoutingService

An interface through which an application (e.g. DHT) works on routing facilities.

メソッドの概要
 void addCallbackOnNodeFailure(CallbackOnNodeFailure callback)
          Registers a callback, which is invoked in case of neighbor node failure.
 void addCallbackOnRoute(CallbackOnRoute callback)
          Registers a callback, which can be invoked on every node along the resolved route.
 void addMessageHandler(int tag, MessageHandler handler)
          Registers a MessageHandler associated with the specified tag.
 MessageSender getMessageSender()
          Returns the MessageSender which this routing service uses.
 MessagingProvider getMessagingProvider()
          Returns the MessagingProvider which this routing service uses.
 RoutingAlgorithm getRoutingAlgorithm()
          Returns the RoutingAlgorithm which this routing service uses.
 IDAddressPair getSelfIDAddressPair()
          Returns the IDAddressPair of this service itself.
 RoutingResult[] invokeCallbacksOnRoute(ID[] target, int numRootCandidates, java.io.Serializable[][] returnedValueContainer, CallbackResultFilter filter, int tag, java.io.Serializable[][] args)
          Performs multiple routing for the multiple targets, and invokes callback method on nodes on the routes for the specified target.

メソッドの詳細

join

RoutingResult join(MessagingAddress initialContact)
                   throws RoutingException
Joins an overlay.

パラメータ:
initialContact - the node which this call contacts initially
戻り値:
a route and neighbors to myself. null if joining failed.
例外:
RoutingException

leave

void leave()
Leaves the overlay. An instance of the routing algorithm is reset.

routeToRootNode

RoutingResult routeToRootNode(ID target,
                              int numRootCandidates)
                              throws RoutingException
Returns a route to the root node for the target.

パラメータ:
target - target ID of routing
numRootCandidates - number of candidates for the root node to be returned
戻り値:
a route to / neighbors of the root node. The route includes the starting node itself.
例外:
RoutingException

routeToRootNode

RoutingResult[] routeToRootNode(ID[] target,
                                int numRootCandidates)

invokeCallbacksOnRoute

RoutingResult invokeCallbacksOnRoute(ID target,
                                     int numRootCandidates,
                                     java.io.Serializable[] returnedValueContainer,
                                     CallbackResultFilter filter,
                                     int tag,
                                     java.io.Serializable[] args)
                                     throws RoutingException
Invokes callback method on nodes on the route for the specified target. On each node on the route callback are invoked with the specified arguments. This method returns a result of a callback on the root node.

パラメータ:
target - target ID of routing
numRootCandidates - number of candidates for the root node which this call request
returnedValueContainer - a value returned from a callback is stored at the head ([0]) of this array. null if no value found.
filter - a filter which judges a value returned from a callback is passed back to the caller.
tag - tag passed to callback
args - arguments passed to callback
戻り値:
a route to / neighbors of the root node. it includes this starting node itself.
例外:
RoutingException

invokeCallbacksOnRoute

RoutingResult[] invokeCallbacksOnRoute(ID[] target,
                                       int numRootCandidates,
                                       java.io.Serializable[][] returnedValueContainer,
                                       CallbackResultFilter filter,
                                       int tag,
                                       java.io.Serializable[][] args)
Performs multiple routing for the multiple targets, and invokes callback method on nodes on the routes for the specified target. Note that an element of the returned array is null if routing to a target corresponding the array element failed.

addCallbackOnRoute

void addCallbackOnRoute(CallbackOnRoute callback)
Registers a callback, which can be invoked on every node along the resolved route.
